summary: SummaryRouge Dior On Stage is an ultra longwear lipstick with a shine finish that shapes and hydrates lips, leaving them visibly plump and smooth.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe lipstick's ultra longwear shine finish combines an "ultra colour" phase - which fixes pigments and the color on the lips - and a "coated shine" phase - a combination of oils that ensures comfort, suppleness and shine. Lips stay hydrated over time and the color remains the same.FeaturesRouge Dior On Stage's innovative "double phase" technology sets pigments and color on the lips, while also ensuring comfort, suppleness and shine. The imperceptible texture visibly smooths lips and the intense color shades remain true over time.Item 2645210How To UseThe bullet has been designed to combine the precision of a lip liner and the fullness of a lipstick. It follows the lips perfectly for ultra-precise application in just one swipe.The rounded shape at the top helps you draw the Cupid's bow on the upper lip.The pointed bottom helps define the lower lip.For optimal application and to preserve the formula, do not wind the bullet more than 2 mm and be sure to close the lid after each use.IngredientsTrimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, C9-12 Alkane, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Methyl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Dextrin Isostearate, Isododecane, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Synthetic Wax, Cellulose, Bis-Hydroxypropyl Dimethicone/Smdi Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Polyethylene, Parfum (Fragrance), Lecithin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sodium Myristoyl Glutamate, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Ethyl Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Vanillin, Propylene Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Linalyl Acetate, Terpineol, Isostearic Acid, Tin Oxide, Paeonia Officinalis Flower Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, [+/- CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: The bullet has been designed to combine the precision of a lip liner and the fullness of a lipstick. It follows the lips perfectly for ultra-precise application in just one swipe.The rounded shape at the top helps you draw the Cupid's bow on the upper lip.The pointed bottom helps define the lower lip.For optimal application and to preserve the formula, do not wind the bullet more than 2 mm and be sure to close the lid after each use.
